argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_relogexp | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> N e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( C e. RR+ -> ( log ` C ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_recnd | |- ( C e. RR+ -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` C ) e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_logne0 | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) -> ( log ` C ) =/= 0 ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( log ` C ) =/= 0 ) |
| 15 | 5, 8, 12, 14 | #P_divassd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( N x. ( ( log ` A ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( C e. RR+ /\ C =/= 1 ) ) -> ( ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) / ( log ` C ) ) = ( N x. ( ( log ` A ) / ( log ` C ) ) ) ) |
